item.title: My NMT project – A case study in failure
item.description: As some of you may know, my mother’s tongue is Romansh. One thing that has been bothering me and probably also many other Romansh speakers or generally anyone doing anything for which they want to provide a Romansh translation is the pure lack of automated Romansh translations. Of course, it does make sense that Romansh isn’t on the top of the list to implement for Google Translates or Deepln´s or frankly any provider of Neural Machine Translation.
